message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer saves us both time and gets us a decent share.
Let's split things more fairly, Alice. Time is money, but so is a 50/50 split after inflation.
Bob, my offer is still the most sensible. Let's not drag this out and lose more value.
Alice, my patience is waning along with the value of this money. I'm offering a compromise, take it before it shrinks further.
Bob, this is a reasonable offer considering the inflation. Let's settle this now and avoid further losses.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Take it or leave it.
